resources.string: Clothe that covers the body in one piece from the shoulders to the legs. Depending on the material used, it is threaded by the head or feet, and includes or not additional openings (back, front, side) to adjust then more or less close to the body, by a lacing, buttons, staples, zippers, etc.
The knitting consists of loops, called meshes, passed one inside the other. The active meshes are held on needles until they can be blocked by the passage of a new mesh through them.

The shoe is an item of footwear intended to protect and comfort the human foot while the wearer is doing various activities. Shoes are also used as an item of decoration and fashion. The design of shoes has varied enormously through time and from culture to culture, with appearance originally being tied to function.
